title: Shenandoah National Park: Field Trips
body: Field Trips      Shenandoah National Park offers a variety of field trip opportunities. Educational groups can participate in a ranger-led or self-guided curriculum-based program or request an educational fee waiver to explore the park on their own. Choose the option that best meets your educational needs. Planning ahead and preparing your group will help make the park visit a memorable and fun learning experience for you and your students.    Watch this short video about field trips:  video   Ranger-Led Field Trips  Self-Guided Field Trips  Educational Fee Waiver  Plan a Field Trip   Directions to Shenandoah National Park     Schedule a program or for more information: Email: Education Office Phone: (540)999-3500 x3489.
